data.title: Did A $100 Billion Bond Sell-Off Signal A Capital War? Ex-Bridgewater Strategist Sees Warning Signs
data.description: Bob Elliott, CIO at Unlimited Funds, raises alarm over $100B bond sell-off post-election. Analysts link it to soaring yields and stocks in late Dec. and Jan. Could be a warning of trade war turning into capital war.

data.title: Chinese Stocks Slide As Trump Eyes More Tariffs And Tougher Trade Restrictions
data.description: U.S.-listed Chinese stocks like Alibaba, Baidu, JD.com, PDD Holdings, NIO, Li Auto, and XPeng dropped amid reports of Trump's possible sanctions on China. China retaliates with tariffs and export restrictions.

data.title: Fed Chair Jerome Powell Faces Trump's Pressure: 'The President Can't Fire Me' As Interest Rates Hold Steady At 4.25%-4.5%
Jim Cramer: This Health Care Stock Is A 'Winner,' Buy Bitcoin Instead Of Coinbase
data.description: On CNBC's “Mad Money Lightning Round,” Jim Cramer recommended buying AbbVie Inc. (NYSE:ABBV), saying it's “just a gem” and a “winner.”  He added, “I can't believe the stock dropped so much.”

data.title: Leading And Lagging Sectors For February 5, 2025
